name: Lay The Dice
description:
Anonymocha’s Description:

Silly goofy dice-loving game. Your goal is to make dice love or friend you or hate you, I guess, whatever you’re into.

Hi today I am graduating to grade 11  and spent the night drawing THICK dice before falling asleep I could not have a better pre-first-day-of-school  experience.

Okay so someone in the comments asked for a tutorial and I am bad at explaining so I will leave this to my team (they are awesome I love them). However I know from my midnight early playtest you press at big numbers on the big buttons or the happy/frown icons when big numbers are not present elsewhere (bad tutorial do not follow). GET THAT DICUSSY WHATEVER IT TAKES BEFORE TIME RUNS OUT.

Credits + Tools
  • This game is made using the Godot game engine
  • Programming by Mo Zurasuta
  • Character Art and UI by Anonymocha
  • Music by Raydee99 and AgentHonour
  • SFX by AgentHonour
  • Writing by Spotleaf
  • Voices by AgentHonour and Anonymocha
